segments.text: How do you do , Mr . Johnson ? I'm Thomas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm coming for the job you've advertised in yesterday's newspaper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have worked for IBM for three years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do your experiences benefit our company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know the marketing from top to bottom and I can develop a new market for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you aware of the aspects of this position and do you feel you are qualified ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I understand my qualification and your needs by researching your company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you enter this company , what section would you like to work in ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If possible , I'd like to be positioned in the International Trade Department .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then , what starting salary do you expect ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to start at RIB 4,000 a month .
segments.speaker: S1
